summary: Two twin sisters, who grew up separately, Dóra, a pseudo-aristocrat, and Lili, an anarchist bomber, are reunited through Z, a mysterious traveller of the luxurious Orient-Express.
cast: Dorota Segda|Oleg Yankovskiy|Paulus Manker|Péter Andorai|Gábor Máté|Gyula Kéry|Andrej Schwartz|Sándor Téri|Sándor Czvetkó|Endre Koronczi|Ágnes Kovács|Eszter Kovács
keywords: title directed by female|orient express|f rated|film projector|telegraph
title: Az én XX. századom
